com.thegongoliers.input.odometry

Class Odometry

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.thegongoliers.input.odometry.Odometry

  • public class Odometry
extends java.lang.Object
    A class for calculating the odometry of a robot from wheel encoders.

      Constructor and Description
      Odometry()

    • Method Detail

      • getDistance

        public static double getDistance(double left,
                                 double right)
        Get the distance traveled by the center of the robot.
        Parameters:
        left - The distance traveled by the left wheels.
        right - The distance traveled by the right wheels.
        Returns:
        The distance traveled by the center of the robot.

      • getAngle

        public static double getAngle(double left,
                              double right,
                              double wheelBase)
        Get the angle traveled by the center of the robot.
        Parameters:
        left - The distance traveled by the left wheels.
        right - The distance traveled by the right wheels.
        wheelBase - The distance between the center of the left and right wheels.
        Returns:
        The angle traveled by the center of the robot in radians.

      • getX

        public static double getX(double left,
                          double right,
                          double angle)
        Get the distance traveled along the x axis by the center of the robot.
        Parameters:
        left - The distance traveled by the left wheels.
        right - The distance traveled by the right wheels.
        angle - The initial angle of the robot in radians.
        Returns:
        The distance traveled in the direction of the x axis.

      • getY

        public static double getY(double left,
                          double right,
                          double angle)
        Get the distance traveled along the y axis by the center of the robot.
        Parameters:
        left - The distance traveled by the left wheels.
        right - The distance traveled by the right wheels.
        angle - The initial angle of the robot in radians.
        Returns:
        The distance traveled in the direction of the y axis.

      • ticksToDistance

        public static double ticksToDistance(double ticks,
                                     double ticksPerRotation,
                                     double radius)
        Convert encoder ticks to a distance.
        Parameters:
        ticks - The ticks of the encoder.
        ticksPerRotation - The ticks per complete rotation of the encoder.
        radius - The radius of the wheel.
        Returns:
        The distance traveled by the wheel.

      • updatePose

        public static com.kylecorry.geometry.Pose2D updatePose(com.kylecorry.geometry.Pose2D previousPose,
                                                       double left,
                                                       double right,
                                                       double wheelBase)
        Update the pose of the robot based on the new odometry.
        Parameters:
        previousPose - The previous pose of the robot.
        left - The distance traveled by the left wheels.
        right - The distance traveled by the right wheels.
        wheelBase - The distance between the center of the left and right wheels.
        Returns:
        The new pose of the robot.
